figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: Number of the 100 most cited and overall PBL articles in medical education by year

claims.sentence: Figure 1 shows the distribution by year of the 100 most cited articles compared with the distribution of the overall publications of PBL in medical education articles (n = 748).
A visualization of author collaboration network is presented in Fig. 2.
Figure 3 shows the collaboration network of 10 countries.

Most of the highly cited research studies were published through the mid-2000s and as shown in Fig. 1, there was an increase in the overall number of articles on PBL in medical education from 1996 to 2007.

A visualization of author collaboration network is presented in Fig. 2.
Figure 3 shows the collaboration network of 10 countries.
